about_the_game:
In Mononeko, players seamlessly weave button presses into the game’s musical beat, creating an immersive dance of attack and movement. With rhythmic precision, players hone their aim to vanquish foes and chain together an endless sequence of commands, but a single misstep can unravel your progress.


Along your journey, you’ll revive fallen kittens to bolster your ranks and gain boons for increased firepower. Time is of the essence as you race to catch the humans before they elude your grasp!


Every day, the streets witness a growing number of abandoned cats. Embark on a heartfelt odyssey and embody the spirits of these cats to confront humans with the consequences of their neglect, exposing a grim mystery behind the feline abandonment and mistreatment, and ignite a spark of change in your pursuit of retribution.

content_descriptors.notes: Mononeko portrays a satirical lens on animal cruelty and death through cartoon depiction. Our focus is to raise awareness of these issues with our protagonist rescuing and resurrecting abused kittens.

detailed_description:
In Mononeko, players seamlessly weave button presses into the game’s musical beat, creating an immersive dance of attack and movement. With rhythmic precision, players hone their aim to vanquish foes and chain together an endless sequence of commands, but a single misstep can unravel your progress.


Along your journey, you’ll revive fallen kittens to bolster your ranks and gain boons for increased firepower. Time is of the essence as you race to catch the humans before they elude your grasp!


Every day, the streets witness a growing number of abandoned cats. Embark on a heartfelt odyssey and embody the spirits of these cats to confront humans with the consequences of their neglect, exposing a grim mystery behind the feline abandonment and mistreatment, and ignite a spark of change in your pursuit of retribution.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Sonoma 14.5
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some graphical shaders in the macOS version are partially incompatible with Apple's Metal API. Does not affect gameplay.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Sonoma 14.5
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Mononeko: A Rhythm Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12500 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X @ 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Mononeko, you weave attacks into the music, chain together movements and race against time to capture the kitten killers who are hiding a dark truth.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Filipino
